title: Fatal Errors!
message:
Some users are experiencing fatal errors in multiplayer. If this is your case, please follow these steps: go to the Betas options on Steam (Doll Impostor -> right-click -> Properties -> Betas) and enable the beta called beta_debug. This will generate logs that will help us identify the cause of the error, as this issue only affects specific players but can cause a crash for all participants in the match.
Contact us through Steam or Discord to review these logs!
Thank you for your patience.
